New Records: Yerson Mosquera tied Carlos Valderrama's record of 11 assists in South American World Cup qualifying
James Rodríguez equaled Falcao García's mark of 13 goals in World Cup qualifying
Key Match Events: Yerson Mosquera scored the opening goal for Colombia in the 25th minute
Nicolás González equalized for Argentina in the 48th minute
James Rodríguez scored a penalty to secure the win for Colombia in the 60th minute
Pre-Game Insights: The match was the first between Colombia and Argentina since the Copa América final
Post-Match Reflections: Colombia is still unbeaten in South American World Cup qualifying
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina leads the round-robin competition with 18 points after eight matches, two points clear of Colombia
Others: The top six teams in South American qualifying will get automatic spots at the 2026 World Cup
Argentina's strikers Lautaro Martínez and Julián Álvarez failed to offer as much danger as they do when veteran Messi is there to create opportunities for them
